name: Jerry Weintraub
birth place: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
biography: Jerry Weintraub was born on September 26, 1937 in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA as Jerome Charles Weintraub. He was a producer and actor, known for The Avengers (1998), The Next Karate Kid (1994) and Behind The Candelabra (2013). He was married to Jane Morgan and Janice Ivy Greenberg. He died on July 6, 2015 in Santa Barbara, California, USA.::Anonymous
trivia: Has managed a number of famous celebrities including: Karen Carpenter, Frank Sinatra, Neil Diamond, The Moody Blues, Bob Dylan and John Denver.
Lived with his girlfriend of 20 years, Susan Ekins until his death in July 2015. Although he and Jane Morgan remained legally married until his death, they separated in the 1980s.
Was a loyal supporter of the Republican Party.
Held the wedding of Milton Rudin and Mrs. Milton Rudin at his home.
He was awarded a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame at 6931 Hollywood Boulevard in Hollywood, California on April 24, 1984.
He was awarded a Golden Palm Star on the Palm Springs Walk of Stars on December 10, 2007.
